alert.note: Alert for Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 12:58PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SUWANNEE AND SOUTHEASTERN HAMILTON COUNTIES THROUGH 145 PM EST... At 1258 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Luraville to 15 miles north of Steinhatchee. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Live Oak, White Springs, Suwannee Springs, Wellborn, Obrien, Mcalpin, Luraville, and Houston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Jacksonville. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for northern Florida.
